actions.text: On agreeing to the Davis (CA) amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.

description: Amendment sought to increase the funding for operations and administration in the International Trade Administration by $3 million and to reduce funding for salaries and expenses of the Federal Prison System by a similar amount.
purpose: An amendment to increase the funding for operations and administration in the International Trade Administration by $3 million and to reduce funding for salaries and expenses of the Federal Prison System by a similar amount.
